'''"The Arrayed Stars Mirrored"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of "The Arrayed Stars Mirrored" can be obtained from {{Quest|Ever Silent Stars}} by obtaining any ending in ''[[Thesis Defense Practice]]'' or ''[[The Remaining Problem]]'' for the first time.
